title: Road Ministry notifies emission test standards for vehicles
description: In its recent notification dated January 5, 2024, the Ministry of Road Transport and Highway said all bi-fuel vehicles with flex fuel option will have to undergo tests for both gaseous pollutants as well as particulate mass and number while hydrogen-run vehicles will have to undergo tests only for emissions of nitrogen oxide.
